title: Get a personalised career recommendation and plan

schema.description: In this questionnaire, we'll ask you about your current situation and have you self-assess your procurement skills and general capabilities.

title: Do you currently work for NSW Government?
Do you currently work in a procurement role, or similar?

schema.help: If so, we'll ask questions about your technical skills to help us recommend roles.
schema.helpExtra: Procurement roles can include disciplines such as strategic sourcing, category management, contract management, analysis, advice, policy and governance. Similar roles may include those in project, policy, administrative, finance, commercial and other related disciplines.

title: Select which role is most similar to your current role

schema.help: We’ll use this as a starting point and does not have to be an exact match.
support: This tool includes common types of procurement roles, and similar related roles, that can be found in the NSW public sector. However, role titles may be different for each NSW public sector organisation.

title: Let’s assess your current procurement skills

schema.description: In this section, you’ll assess yourself on the focus procurement skills required for your current role. These are technical skills based on the {{procurement_professionals_capability_set}}.

title: Your personalised career pathway is ready!
